00034 
00035 #define fftw_real double
00036 #define POSdouble(ix,iy,iz) (((ix)*(ny) + (iy)) * (2*((nz)/2+1)) + (iz)) 
00037 #define ACC_R(ix,iy,iz) (( (ix) * (ny) + (iy) ) * (nz) + (iz) )
00038 #define ACC_C(ix,iy,iz) (( (ix) * (ny) + (iy) ) * ((nz)/2+1) + (iz))
00039 
00040 #ifdef GAUSSIAN_KERNEL
00041 // #warning "FYI: Enabling Gaussian Kernel in PoissonSolver"
00042 #else
00043 // #warning "FYI: Enabling Top Hat Kernel in PoissonSolver"
00044 #endif
00045 
00051 template < int nstencil >
00052 class PoissonSolver {
00053  protected:
00054   ScalarField* prho_;
00055   ScalarField* pphi_;
00056 
00057  public:
00058   PoissonSolver( ScalarField *prho, ScalarField *pphi )
00059     { prho_ = prho; pphi_ = pphi;}
00060 
00064   inline double Gauss3D( const double &k, const double &sigma ) {
00065     double v = 1.0 / ( pow( sigma * sigma * 2.0 * M_PI, 1.5 ) );
00066     v *= exp( -0.5 * k * k / ( sigma * sigma ) );
00067     return v;
00068   }
00069 
00074   inline double TopHat3D( const double &k, const double &R ) {
00075     if ( k <= R ) {
00076       double norm = (4.0*M_PI/3.0) * R * R * R;
00077       return 1.0 / norm;
00078     }
00079     return 0.0;
00080   }
00081 
00085   void test(){
00086     prho_->setValue(0,0,0,0.3f);
00087     cout << prho_->getValue(0,0,0) << endl;
00088     cout << pphi_->getValue(0,0,0) << endl;
00089     for(int i=0; i<512; ++i){
00090       pphi_->setValue(i,i,i,-i);
00091     }
00092     cout << pphi_->getValue(0,0,0) << endl;
00093     
00094   }

00099   // old syntax
00100   // void solve( ScalarField *pphi, double Boxlength, double sigma ) {
00101   void solve( double Boxlength, double sigma ){
00102     cout << " in solve()..." << endl;
00103     int nx = prho_->getNx();
00104     int ny = prho_->getNy();
00105     int nz = prho_->getNz();
00106 
00107     GreensFunction<nstencil> gf( 2.0 * M_PI / ( double ) nx );
00108 
00109     cout << " allocating memory..." << endl;
00110     fftw_real *data = new fftw_real[ nx * ny * nz ];
00111     fftw_real *kern = new fftw_real[ nx * ny * nz ];
00112 
00113     cout << " copying data..." << endl;
00114     // copy data without ghost cells to array data for FFTW
00115     for ( int ix = 0; ix < nx; ++ix ) {
00116       int iix = (ix>=nx/2?ix:ix-nx/2);
00117       for ( int iy = 0; iy < ny; ++iy ) {
00118     int iiy = (iy>=ny/2?iy:iy-ny/2);
00119     for ( int iz = 0; iz < nz; ++iz ) {
00120       int iiz = (iz>=nz/2?iz:iz-nz/2);
00121       double k = sqrt( iix*iix + iiy*iiy + iiz*iiz );
00122 
00123 #ifdef TOPHAT_KERNEL
00124       kern[ ACC_R( ix, iy, iz ) ] = TopHat3D( k, sigma );
00125 #else
00126       kern[ ACC_R( ix, iy, iz ) ] = Gauss3D( k, sigma );
00127 #endif
00128       data[ ACC_R( ix, iy, iz ) ] = (double) prho_->getValue( ix, iy, iz );
00129     }
00130       }
00131     }
00132 
00133     cout << " creating cdata..." << endl;
00134     fftw_complex *cdata = new fftw_complex[ nx * ny * ( nz / 2 + 1 ) ];
00135     cout << " creating plan..." << endl;
00136     fftw_plan plan   = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_3d( nx, ny, nz, &data[0], &cdata[0],
00137                          FFTW_ESTIMATE ); 
00138     cout << " executing plan..." << endl;
00139     fftw_execute( plan );
00140     cout << " destroying plan..." << endl;
00141     fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
00142 
00143     cout << " creating ckern..." << endl;
00144     fftw_complex *ckern = new fftw_complex[ nx * ny * ( nz / 2 + 1 ) ];
00145     cout << " creating kplan..." << endl;
00146     fftw_plan kplan  = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_3d( nx, ny, nz, &kern[0], &ckern[0],
00147                          FFTW_ESTIMATE );
00148     cout << " executing kplan..." << endl;
00149     fftw_execute( kplan );
00150     cout << " destroying kplan..." << endl;
00151     fftw_destroy_plan(kplan);
00152 
00153     double Omegam0 = 0.25;
00154     double a = 1.0;
00155     double fftnorm = 1.0 / ( nx * ny * nz );
00156     double mGpi = -1.5 * Omegam0 / a * fftnorm;
00157 
00158     cout << " copying data..." << endl;
00159     for ( int ix = 0; ix < nx; ++ix ) {
00160       int iix = (ix<=nx/2?ix:ix-nx);
00161       for ( int iy = 0; iy < ny; ++iy ) {
00162     int iiy = (iy<=ny/2?iy:iy-ny);
00163     for ( int iz = 0; iz < ( nz / 2 + 1 ); ++iz ) {
00164 
00165       double fac = mGpi/(gf.apply( iix )+gf.apply( iiy )+gf.apply( iz ) );
00166       double dre = cdata[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ][0];//real part 
00167       double dim = cdata[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ][1];//imag part
00168 #if 0
00169       //ckern[ijk][0] = dre*fftnorm;
00170       //ckern[ijk][1] = dim*fftnorm;
00171       //cdata[ijk][0] *= fac;
00172       //cdata[ijk][1] *= fac;
00173 
00174       ckern[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ][0] = dre * fftnorm;//real
00175       ckern[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ][1] = dim * fftnorm;//imag
00176       //std::cerr << cdata[ACC_C(ix,iy,iz)][0] << ", ";
00177 
00178       cdata[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ][0] *= fac;
00179       cdata[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ][1] *= fac;
00180 #else
00181       double kre = ckern[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ][0];//real part
00182       double kim = ckern[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ][1];//imag part
00183 
00184       ckern[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ][0] = (dre*kre - dim*kim) * fftnorm;
00185       ckern[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ][1] = (dre*kim + dim*kre) * fftnorm;
00186 
00187       cdata[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ][0] = (dre*kre - dim*kim) * fac;
00188       cdata[ ACC_C( ix, iy, iz ) ][1] = (dre*kim + dim*kre) * fac;
00189 #endif
00190     }
00191       }
00192     }
00193 
00194     cdata[ 0 ][0] = 0.0;
00195     cdata[ 0 ][1] = 0.0;
00196 
00197     cout << " creating iplan..." << endl;
00198     fftw_plan iplan  = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_3d( nx, ny, nz, &cdata[0], &data[0],
00199                          FFTW_ESTIMATE ); 
00200     cout << " executing iplan..." << endl;
00201     fftw_execute( iplan );
00202     cout << " destroying iplan..." << endl;
00203     fftw_destroy_plan(iplan);
00204 
00205     cout << " creating ikplan..." << endl;
00206     fftw_plan ikplan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_3d( nx, ny, nz, &ckern[0], &kern[0],
00207                          FFTW_ESTIMATE ); 
00208     cout << " executing ikplan..." << endl;
00209     fftw_execute( ikplan );
00210     cout << " destroying ikplan..." << endl;
00211     fftw_destroy_plan(ikplan);
00212     cout << " deleting ckern..." << endl;
00213     delete[] ckern;
00214 
00215     cout << " setting prho_..." << endl;
00216     for ( int ix = 0; ix < nx; ++ix ){
00217       for ( int iy = 0; iy < ny; ++iy ){
00218     for ( int iz = 0; iz < nz; ++iz ){
00219       prho_->setValue( ix, iy, iz, kern[ ACC_R( ix, iy, iz ) ]); 
00220       //kern[ix][iy][iz];
00221     }
00222       }
00223     }
00224     
00225     cout << " deleting kern..." << endl;
00226     delete[] kern;

00287

00289                   - 6.0 * f0 );
